notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: C.C. conceived and designed the experiments, performed and optimized the formulations, performed the chemico-physical and technological characterization and financed the project. M.d.C.T. and M.d.C.S. performed the in vitro experiments on Candida species. C.M.-G. and A.M.S. performed the in vitro cells viability experiments. T.M. performed DSC studies. E.M.B.S. contributed, together with C.C., in financing the project. All authors contributed to the raw materials and analysis tools. The manuscript was drafted by C.C. and appeared in its final form by the critical contributions from T.M. and E.M.B.S.
